title: graphics card!
body: guys will i be able to play league with a deskop which has intel hd graphics 2000?

replies.body:
A second-generation Intel Core processor is a good start, but your PC will need to meet the rest of the specs outlined in our [minimum requirements article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/)

Let me know if you have any questions.
